text: Casey E. Luna (born May 26, 1931) is an American Democratic politician, businessman, and racing driver. He was Lieutenant Governor of New Mexico from 1991 to 1995, under Governor Bruce King. He is also a businessman. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1931 births Category:Businesspeople from New Mexico Category:Lieutenant Governors of New Mexico Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:American racecar drivers Category:Sportspeople from New Mexico
title: Casey Luna
